category.name: Product Structure.Appearance Configuration.Background
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: APPR_background_updater_admin_email_address
preference.preference_description: Whom to send emails regarding failure to process an appearance update package in background mode. Special values are: - $USER meaning the Teamcenter user that the appearance updater is logged in as - $OSUSER meaning the OS user running the appearance updater As shipped, the value is $OSUSER, to ensure that at least someone is notified.
